settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Glycerin, Sucrose, Dipropylene Glycol, Water, 1,2-Hexanediol, C12-14 Pareth-12, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Triolein, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Artemisia Vulgaris Extract, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Lactobacillus/Panax Ginseng Root Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Rice Ferment, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces/Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Ferment Filtrate, Saccharomyces/Potato Extract Ferment Filtrate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Perilla Frutescens Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Spiraea Ulmaria Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Glycolipids, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Piper Methysticum Root Extract, Vegetable Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Limonene, Linalool




Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW



STEP 1

Apply an appropriate amount and gently massage over the skin.


STEP 2

Rinse with warm water.


WHEN

2-3 times per week.


GOOD TO KNOW

Use on dry skin before cleansing to up that exfoliating experience. For a milder exfoliation, mix the scrub with body wash to cleanse and exfoliate in one step.

settings.text:
1. Get your scrub on! Remove dead skin cells and rejuvenate tired skin with this gentle micro-crystalline sugar scrub.
  2. Remove unwanted impurities, not your skin barrier - this sugar scrub works gently and effectively to slough off stubborn skin cells and daily debris without disturbing your skin's natural balance.
  3. Suamel, a bioremeditator that is used to clean up ocean waste without disturbing native wildlife, works similarly for our skin by removing unwanted impurities but leaving balance intact, restoring skin hydration and maintaining a proper barrier.
  4. Feel good about your scrubbing experience knowing that you're creating suppler, smoother skin in the process.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
